Title: Relates to mercantile establishments and the defense of lawful detention
Summary: Relates to mercantile establishments and the defense of lawful detention; sets requirements that the release from detention shall not be conditioned on signing of any documents or agreements, if anything is signed a copy must be provided  to the individual or their parent or guardian.
LawCode: Amd ยง218, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to mercantile establishments and the defense of lawful detention
